fields.name: Horizontal Padlock Knot Ring
fields.description:
Celtic padlock knot in hallmarked 925 Sterling Silver.

Significance of the Celtic Knot:      

Celtic knots are complete, endless loops without any beginning or end. The use of only one thread highlights the Celts’ belief in the interconnectedness of life and eternity. They saw the constant interlacing as the physical and spiritual crossing of paths, expressing permanence and the endurance of life, love and faith.

fields.name: Celtic Loop Ring
fields.description:
A Hallmarked 925 Sterling Silver Celtic Ring with a Figure Eight Infinity Knot Design.
Significance of Celtic Knot: 

Celtic knots are complete, endless loops without any beginning or end. The use of only one thread highlights the Celts’ belief in the interconnectedness of life and eternity. They saw the constant interlacing as the physical and spiritual crossing of paths, expressing permanence and the endurance of life, love and faith.  

As a symbol of eternity this ring would make for a lovely gift, full of significance and meaning.

fields.name: Elongated Trinity Ring
fields.description:
A Hallmarked 925 Sterling Silver Trinity Knot Ring. 

Symbolism of the Trinity Knot:

‘Three’ is an important concept in Celtic mythology e.g. the existence of three material domains (earth, sea and sky), three spiritual worlds (earth, heaven and the underworld) and triple goddesses. The triquetra/trinity symbol and triangular knots depict this three-fold worldview.

fields.name: Band with Trinity Stamp Ring
fields.description:
Simple Trinity Band in hallmarked 925 Sterling Silver.
Significance of Triquetra/ Trinity Knot:

  ‘Three’ is an important concept in Celtic mythology e.g. the existence of three material domains (earth, sea and sky), three spiritual worlds (earth, heaven and the underworld) and ‘triple goddesses.’ Triquetra/trinity symbols and triangular knots depict the balance, harmony and stability of this three-fold worldview.

fields.name: Triple Spiral with Window Ring
fields.description:
Celtic Triskele ring in hallmarked 925 Sterling Silver.

Significance of the Triskele:

Also known as the triple spiral, this ancient Celtic symbol represents three connected domains of material existence - earth, water and sky. It can also symbolise growth and evolution in nature, cycles of life and rebirth, and the movement of the cosmos. 

This would make for a lovely gift, full of significance and meaning.
